subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Patrick Ianni picked a good time to score his first goal in Major League Soccer.Ianni’s headed goal off a corner kick by his teammate Stuart Holden in the 81st minute provided the Houston Dynamo with a 1-0 victory against the Kansas City Wizards yesterday at Arrowhead Stadium.The victory improved Houston’s record to 7-5-1, second in M.L.S.’s Western Conference.Midfielder Brian Mullan had two decent scoring chances before the Dynamo finally capitalized in the 81st minute. Holden’s high corner kick found Ianni’s head at the near post, at the top of the 6-yard box, and Wizards goalkeeper Kevin Hartman had no chance for a save.
